Concept.Comments: The configuration of the selected component is not avilable (not completed)
Concept.String: This operation is not yet available!

Concept.Comments: Configuration name cannot be empty during saving
Concept.String: Please, set the configuration name before pressing the Save button!

Concept.Comments: Configuration name not available, already used by another configuration
Concept.String: This configuration name is not available (is used by another configuration)!

Concept.Comments: When change a Configuration Factory the user could choose if modify the factory or to create a user configuration
Concept.String: Do you want to apply changes to factory configuration?

Concept.Comments: Ask the user if he's sure to remove the configuration
Concept.String: Are you sure you want to remove the configuration:

Concept.Comments: Ask the user if he wants to remove the Factory configuration
Concept.String: Do you want to remove the Factory configuration also?

Concept.Comments: Factory configuration can't be removed because it's used by another configuration
Concept.String: It's impossible to remove the factory configuration because it's linked by another configuration.

Concept.Comments: The configuration name is too long.
Concept.String: The configuration name can't be so long.

Concept.Comments: Can't remove the configuration because it is part of a collection..
Concept.String: The selected configuration can't be removed because it is part of the following collection:

Concept.Comments: Can't remove the configuration because it is the last of the component
Concept.String: The selected configuration can't be removed because it is the last for this component

Concept.Comments: It indicates the profile/preset currently in use.
It indicates the subset of clinical configurable components (buttons on main video). It's a Tab title.
It indicates the subset of configurable components (buttons on main video) that the user can use only with RD hardware key. It's a Tab title.
It indicates the subset of configurable components (buttons) that the user can use only with Service hardware key
It indicates the subset of system configurable components (buttons on main video). It's a Tab title.
It indicates that it's not possible to import more than one item of the same kind with the same name.
Concept.String: It's not possible to import more than one item of the same kind with the same name. Only one will be imported. Please check imported data.

The header that indicates the user interface portion dedicated to the modification of an existing configuration

The button (on main video) used to create a new, duplicated, configuration

The button used to rename a configuration

The button used to discard changes

The button used to confirm import operations. Ask to Elena/MDP for the meaning.
The button used to confirm export operations. Ask to Elena/MDP for the meaning.

Concept.String: Please, select the one you want to import.

Concept.String: The following preset are already present in the device.

Concept.Comments: Displayed if none USB is present in the device

The remote assistance program has not been correctly installed.
Concept.String: The remote assistance module has not been correctlly installed!

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: To enable a Remote Service session the User should directly contact the Esaote Service, to get a PIN that has a limited temporal validity.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: After inserting the PIN and pressing CONNECT, the Remote Service session will be established.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: By inserting the PIN and pressing CONNECT the contacted qualified Esaote personnel will get full access to the device and all the healthcare information present in it, for service purposes.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: A chat window will allow the User to get in touch with the Esaote personnel who is accessing the device;

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: we suggest to remain close to the device during all the Remote Service session to be able to cooperate if necessary with the Esaote personnel.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: The User can always abort the Remote Service session by closing the chat window, or can disable the remote access by pressing the red X on the toolbar or the Pause/Break key of the keyboard.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: NOTE: Remote Service could not be available for all countries and for all network configurations.

Concept.Comments: It is a part of the disclaimer.
Concept.String: WARNING: until the end of the Remote Service session the device MUST NOT BE USED for making diagnoses or for live scanning except for testing purposes when requested by the Esaote personnel.

Concept.Comments: Button used to configure the network connection (proxy, ...).
Button used to check the connection to the network
Button used to start the connection with the remote technician.
Button used to interrupt the connection with the remote technician.
The remote assistance program has not been correctly installed.
Concept.String: The remote assistance module has not been correctlly installed: path not found.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has not been correctly installed.
Concept.String: The remote assistance module has not been correctlly installed: exe file not found.

Concept.Comments: The PIN inserted by the user is not valid, not well done.
It is displayed to inform the user that the connection is starting.
It is displayed to inform the user that the system is checking the connection to the network.
It is displayed to inform the user that the connection to the network is available.
It is displayed to inform the user that the connection to the network is not available.
The remote assistance connection has been closed.
The remote assistance program has been terminated with an unexpected error.
Concept.String: Unknown error: a bad PIN or another unknown error has been verifed.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated because a wrong PIN.
Concept.String: Error: a wrong PIN has been entered.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated because the PIN entered has been already used.
Concept.String: The user has entered an already used PIN. Please retry.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated because the user interrupted it.
Concept.String: The remote session has been terminated by the user.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated because the technician interrupted it.
Concept.String: The remote session has been terminated by the technician.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated with an unknown error.
Concept.String: An unknown error has been verified.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated.
Concept.String: The remote session has been terminated.

Concept.Comments: The remote assistance program has been terminated because the connection to the network is not available.
